subject: Automatic reply: Shipping update for order #SSN1837
description_text: I will be out of the office starting July 4th and will return on July 10th. I will have limited access to email during this time.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamie Capehart,     Your parcel has been will be shipped on the 5th and is expected to be delivered around the 9th, here is the link to your logistics tracking. https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=1ZH912Y00309183786
